mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.tasktype, t.runtype, t.sql_text, t.run_param, t.jarpath, t.task_describe, t.create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lark_dev_tasklist ( `name`, tasktype, runtype, run_param, sql_text, task_describe, create_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{tasktype}, #{runtype}, #{run_param}, #{sql_text}, #{task_describe}, #{create_time} );
mapper.update: UPDATE lark_dev_tasklist SET `name` = #{name}, tasktype = #{tasktype}, runtype = #{runtype}, run_param = #{run_param}, sql_text = #{sql_text}, task_describe = #{task_describe}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE id = #{id}
